definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Di4 qiu2 Wu4 li3 Xue2 hui4
tian1 ti3 wu4 li3 xue2 jia1

sentences.english: Coriolis acceleration is a nodus in general mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 科里奧利加速度在普通物理力學中是一難點。

sentences.english: IN 1887 physicists were feeling pretty smug about their subject.
sentences.chinese: 1887年物理學家們對自己的學科都頗爲自鳴得意。

sentences.english: We need physical access to a computer with a keyboard hooked directly to it.
sentences.chinese: 需要用直接連接到計算機上的鍵盤來物理訪問計算機。

sentences.english: One of the Meccas for the leading physicists of that time was in Gottingen.
sentences.chinese: 那個時候引導物理學家的麥加聖地之一，是哥廷根。

sentences.english: Quantum theory is a branch of physics that deals with very small particles.
sentences.chinese: 量子論是一門研究微粒子的物理學。

sentences.english: Physics are one of my favourite subjects.
sentences.chinese: 物理是我最喜歡的學科之一。

sentences.english: The wave form of each main physical quantities are drawn by computer.
sentences.chinese: 還利用計算機繪圖畫出了各主要物理量的波形圖。

sentences.english: “It’s just the laws of physics, ” explained Banos.
They were simply the physical manifestations of your belief in peoples’ evil nature.
sentences.chinese: 這就是你信念中關於人類邪惡本質的物理表現。

sentences.english: A physical spline is a thin piece of wood or other flexible material.
sentences.chinese: 物理樣條是一塊薄木片或其他有彈性的物質。

sentences.english: Holographic photographic technique is a basic experiment in university physics experiment.
sentences.chinese: 全息照相技術是大學物理實驗中的一個基礎實驗。

sentences.english: It is well known that accretion disks are hydrodynamic disks with anomalous viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 天體物理吸積盤是具有反常粘滯的流體盤。

sentences.english: To preserve the theory, physicists would have to make some changes. [Video: Dark Matter in 3-D]
sentences.chinese: 爲了保持這個理論，物理學家就必須去做某些修改。

sentences.english: In addition to cutaways, we also explain physics.
sentences.chinese: 除了拍攝剖面圖以外，我們也解釋物理學。

sentences.english: A method for division of reservoir petrophysical facies by fuzzy clustering is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了應用模糊聚類劃分儲集層岩石物理相的方法。

sentences.english: We always reject zero as an eigenfunction on the ground of physics.
sentences.chinese: 根據物理上的理由，我們總是剔除把零作爲本徵函數。

definition: physics and chemistry/to govern and educate
the sciences (as opposed to the humanities 文科[wen2 ke1])
abbr. for mathematics 數學|数学[shu4 xue2], physics 物理[wu4 li3] and chemistry 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
